example_projects.title: Hello Trillian
example_projects.description: This is a basic example of how to use Trillian to implement the operations needed for a verifiable log.

example_projects.title: Log requests to post public messages
example_projects.description: Employees at your company can post to a public messaging platform ‘Tritter’. Since Tritter doesn’t support multi-login, TritBot uses Trillian to log each message request with the details of the sender in order to discourage abuse.
